casebody.data:
WALKER, et al.
v.
DRIVEN HOLDINGS, LLC 395A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 23, 2018 David C. Boggs, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Colin R. Stockton, Attorney at Law, for Walker, Ken, et al. Michael W. Mitchell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jackson Wyatt Moore, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Driven Holdings, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2018 by Plaintiffs to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of January 2018."
